content: use the same method as before- pick up 3 out of every 4 stitches start working with 1x 1 rib and continue until the ribbing is 3 cm long knit the first 6 stitches cast off the rest except the last 6 secure the last 6 stitches with a stitch marker or a safety pin knit stockinette until your tail is 50 cm long cast off join the yarn to the stitches you secured before and knit another tail cast off weave in the ends and enjoy your new hand knit bonnet
